Film show on 45th anniversary of Sudanese Independence 
    Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- A film show was held here yesterday under the sponsorship of the DPRK-Sudan Friendship Association on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of Sudanese Independence.
 Present there were vice-Minister of Culture Song Sok Hwan who is chairman of the DPRK-Sudan Friendship Association, members of the association and working people in the city.    
 The participants saw a documentary film of Sudan.
